description: Detects script file execution (.js, .jse, .vba, .vbe, .vbs, .wsf) by Wscript/Cscript
author: Michael Haag
false_positives: Some additional tunning is required. It is recommended to add the user profile path in CommandLine if it is getting too noisy.
name: WSF/JSE/JS/VBA/VBE File Execution Via Cscript/Wscript
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("wscript.exe" OR "cscript.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\wscript.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*.js*" OR "*.jse*" OR "*.vba*" OR "*.vbe*" OR "*.vbs*" OR "*.wsf*"))
